import React from 'react'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Carousel, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Style.css'; import Resume from './../img/pallotta_resume.pdf'; import { FaStar, FaStarHalf, FaStarHalfAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; function ContentContainer({ navSelected, setShowToast }) { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); } useEffect(() => { var divContainer = document.getElementById("content_container"); var divs = divContainer.getElementsByClassName("contentDivs"); var carouselDescriptionsContainer = document.getElementById("carousel-descriptions"); var carouselDescriptions = carouselDescriptionsContainer.getElementsByTagName("div"); for (let item of divs) { if (item.dataset.item !== navSelected) { item.classList.add("hiddenDivs"); } else { item.classList.remove("hiddenDivs"); item.style.color = "red" } } for (let description of carouselDescriptions) { if (parseInt(description.dataset.index) !== index) { description.classList.add("hiddenDivs"); } else { description.classList.remove("hiddenDivs"); } } }); return (

My Education

High School (Italy): Liceo Scientifico A. Romita, Campobasso, Italy

High School (USA): Bishop Grimes Jr./Sr. High School, Syracuse, NY

University: Rochester Institute of Technology, Rochester, NY

Major: Web and Mobile Computing

Educational Achievements

Completed three years of high school at the Liceo Scientifico A. Romita, Campobasso, Italy.

Graduated from Bishop Grimes Jr./Sr. High School in Syracuse, NY.

Received the RIT's Founder Scholarship for Internation Students.

Awarded the B. Thomas Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences Dean's List (Fall 2018, Spring 2019, Fall 2019, Spring 2020).
